Test program
  Forward
     New PC = PC + 2 + (2 Ã— Offset)
     New PC = (Target - (PC + 2)) / 2

  Backward
     New PC = (Target - (PC + 2)) / 2
     OOP => Add, Subtract, move neg out, divide, invert binary, add one

>0000:     DATA     >1000    ; Place value
>0002:     DATA     >0080    ; Place value
>0080:     JMP      >07      ; Jump to >0090
>0090:     JMP      >07      ; Jump to >00A0
>00A0:     JMP      >0F      ; Jump to >00C0
>00C0:     JMP      >DF      ; Jump to >0080

================================================================================

Hex Machine Code:
10 00 00 80 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
10 07 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
10 07 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
10 0F 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
10 DF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00

Low byte:
00 80 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
07 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
07 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
0F 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
DF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00

High byte:
10 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
10 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
10 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
10 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
10 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
